TopicTitle: Help! KSC isn't showing properly after installing new mods.

Articles.Content:
So, I'm using:

Real Solar System

TAC Life Support

KW Rocketry

FAR

B9 Aerospace

Deadly Reentry

Distant Object

Remote Tech 2

and the associated toolbars and such.

During this latest install (Deadly Reentry, RSS, TAC, RM2) which I did today, I started up KSP, and started a new save. However, KSC just shows up like this.

Any idea on what I can do to fix this?

Uuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuu I think you have successfully blew up kerbin...............

Just a guess.....

Edited June 14, 2014 by stanz250
Its real solar system. Get rid of it or install it correctly.

First, you can check the output_log.txt in KSP_Install\KSP_Data\output_log.txt for errors to see what is screwing up.

Having said that, you are running several 'involved' mods in that they change significant chunks of the game.

My suspicion is that it is either Real Solar System, FAR, or Distant Object that is conflicting and would test with those removed to start troubleshooting.

D.
I would've said it was RT2 causing that - make sure you have the community fix installed from the thread.
If your KSC is underground, up your terrain detail (or follow the other instructions in the RSS FAQ).
Ok, figured it out, thanks for your help everyone!

How did you instal Real Solar System? Did you just copy and paste the whole RSS folder including the "Module Manager" file inside as well? I'm trying to install and not sure if i'm supposed to include that file or just drag and drop the "RealSolarSystem" folder from inside the initial folder.
You could install it as the installation instructions direct. Readme and OP both tell you how
